程序包 views.game

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AttackView
    class AttackView is the view for attack phase
    BasicView
    The Class BasicView.
    CardExchangeView
    The Class CardExchangeView.
    EndGameView
    The Class EndGameView.
    FortificationView
    class FortificationView is the view for fortification phase
    PlayerSetupView
    Class PlayerSetupView is the view for player to start up by selecting number of players
    PlayerWorldDomainView
    This class is to show the player world domination view It is an observer
    ReinforcementView
    Class ReinforcementView is the view for a part of setup phase and the reinforcement phase in this view players place their given armies one by one on their own countries then reinforcement phase begins
    StartTournamentListener  
    StateView
    class ViewState to switching between different views of the game
    TournamentChooseMapListener  
    TournamentSetupView
    The Class TournamentSetupView.
